parameters.name: All
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to remove all tags from the resource. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

>  If you specify both the All and TagKey.N parameters, the All parameter does not take effect.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The resource IDs. You can specify at most 50 resource IDs in each call.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the resource. valid value:

- service
- serviceinstance
- artifact

parameters.name: TagKey
parameters.description: The tag keys. You can specify 1 to 20 tag keys.
